description:
A new discovery in a previously mapped out dungeon might be the first step toward Kazuma repaying his massive debt. Unfortunately for him, Aqua is determined to help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kono Meikyuu no Omo ni Yasuragi o!
Peace for the Master of This Labyrinth!
Que le maître de ce labyrinthe repose en paix !
この迷宮の主に安らぎを!
